comment: Very easy class, very easy professor she's very understanding. Majority of the work is on connect and all the quizzes are no lockdown no WebCam.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: This class is the easiest A as long as you show up to class and do the connect homework, where she gives you more than enough time to complete. There are 4 tests, all open note in connect as well. Class is basically going over slideshows and examples from the content. Literally just show up to class and do the homework and you'll be fine.

Took her class in 2023. She was a good teacher. Spanish is not a crazy class. If you take her and do your work you will easily pass. Everything (homework/tests) is done through connect (an online service) at home, but the lectures are in person and require attendance to pass because there are occasionally in person assignments.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Im a student who doesnt study much but it was really easy just do the connect assignments and attend class and you should be good
Although attendance is mandatory just complete your work on connect, participate in class, and review her power points. It's really an easy A and she's really nice and patient

Very unclear grading, unorganized online class (due to COVID). She's a really sweet lady, but she seems to have a hard time with organization and communication. I think this class would be a lot better in person. Luckily I already had credit for this class from my AP test so I dropped it before it began to effect my GPA.
Would not take again there are much better teachers. I could probably teach Spanish to myself better than she was snarky, didn't give extra credit and I hope she sees this.
very rude did not enjoy her. do not take it if you want to have a good experience. not understanding at all and was annoying hated her!
This lady was not understanding what so ever during COVID 19 shutdown!!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Profesora Alejo is amazing! She is super understanding and always willing to help students who need it. She is also very hilarious. You should definitely take her!
